archimate:BusinessObject.name: Security Principles Topic
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This is a Security Architecture Review topic which relates to applying security principles.
Clearly identifying how the design addresses the organization's security principles ensures that there's a consistent approach to security across different projects and initiatives. This alignment helps to avoid gaps or inconsistencies that could introduce vulnerabilities into the system. Additionally, it fosters trust among stakeholders, who can more easily understand how the design contributes to the overall security posture of the organization.
These are mandatory security minimums set by tech services and mandated as part of our base customer contracts (As a required part of the security baseline).
